20110114000615.000|20110114000616.000|CC1|>> HE SEEMED TO BE NICE AND

20110114000616.000|20110114000618.000|CC1|BUT IT IS THE NAME ATTACHED     
20110114000618.000|20110114000619.000|CC1|TO THAT.                        
20110114000619.000|20110114000621.000|CC1|>> RIZZO, ANYBODY HOME.         
20110114000621.000|20110114000622.000|CC1|>> NEIGHBORS SAY THEY HAVE

20110114001303.000|20110114001304.000|CC1|DESTROYED TO MAKE ROOM FOR A    
20110114001304.000|20110114001305.000|CC1|DUMP SITE.

20110114001308.000|20110114001309.000|CC1|WHILE THE WORK WAS BEING

20110114001310.000|20110114001314.000|CC1|>> IT WAS THE LAST FRAGMENT     
20110114001314.000|20110114001317.000|CC1|OF PRISTINE NATIVE WOODLAND     
20110114001317.000|20110114001318.000|CC1|LEFT IN THE SAN GABRIEL

20110114001320.000|20110114001322.000|CC1|>> Reporter: PROTESTORS AND     
20110114001322.000|20110114001323.000|CC1|TREE SITTERS FAILED TO SAVE     
20110114001323.000|20110114001324.000|CC1|200 TREES IN ARCADIA.           
20110114001324.000|20110114001326.000|CC1|THE COUNTY SPENT A SECOND       
20110114001326.000|20110114001328.000|CC1|DAY CUTTING DOWN THE CENTURY    
20110114001328.000|20110114001328.000|CC1|OLD GROVE.                      
20110114001328.000|20110114001330.000|CC1|>> WE UNDERSTAND THAT THE       
20110114001330.000|20110114001331.000|CC1|OAK TREES MEANT A LOT TO THE    
20110114001331.000|20110114001332.000|CC1|PEOPLE HERE.                    
20110114001332.000|20110114001334.000|CC1|BUT THIS SITE WAS PURCHASED     
20110114001334.000|20110114001334.000|CC1|60 YEARS AGO FOR THIS           
20110114001334.000|20110114001335.000|CC1|PURPOSE.                        
20110114001335.000|20110114001336.000|CC1|>> THE SITE WILL BE USED TO     
20110114001336.000|20110114001338.000|CC1|DUMP DIRT, ROCKS AND            
20110114001338.000|20110114001340.000|CC1|BOULDERS FROM A NEARBY          
20110114001340.000|20110114001341.000|CC1|RESERVOIR USED FOR DRINKING     
20110114001341.000|20110114001343.000|CC1|WATER AND FLOOD CONTROL.        
20110114001343.000|20110114001345.000|CC1|>> THE DAM ITSELF WAS BUILT     
20110114001345.000|20110114001345.000|CC1|1927.                           
20110114001345.000|20110114001347.000|CC1|IT DOESN'T MEET SEISMIC         
20110114001347.000|20110114001348.000|CC1|STANDARDS.                      
20110114001348.000|20110114001350.000|CC1|AND THERE IS SO MUCH            
20110114001350.000|20110114001350.000|CC1|SEDIMENT BEHIND THE DAM NOW     
20110114001350.000|20110114001353.000|CC1|IT IS AFFECTING THE             
20110114001353.000|20110114001355.000|CC1|OPERATION OF SAFETY VALVES      
20110114001355.000|20110114001356.000|CC1|THAT WOULD BE USED TO EMPTY     
20110114001356.000|20110114001358.000|CC1|THE DAM IN THE EVENT OF A       
20110114001358.000|20110114001359.000|CC1|CATACLYSMIC EVENT.              
20110114001359.000|20110114001400.000|CC1|>> ALL OF THE TREES WILL BE     
20110114001400.000|20110114001401.000|CC1|DOWN BY THE AFTERNOON.          
20110114001401.000|20110114001403.000|CC1|AND THEN THEY WILL BRING IN     
20110114001403.000|20110114001406.000|CC1|WOOD CHIPPERS AND OAKS AND      
20110114001406.000|20110114001408.000|CC1|SYCAMORES WILL BE USED AS       
20110114001408.000|20110114001409.000|CC1|MULCH AND GROUND COVER.         
20110114001409.000|20110114001410.000|CC1|>> THE POLICE ARE STANDING      
20110114001410.000|20110114001411.000|CC1|GUARD TO KEEP PROTESTORS        
20110114001411.000|20110114001412.000|CC1|OUT.
